channel.title: Vertical Federated Learning on Chengyu Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in Vertical Federated Learning on Chengyu Zhang

item.title: Defending Batch-Level Label Inference and Replacement Attacks in Vertical Federated Learning
item.description: Explores vulnerabilities in VFL models to label inference and backdoor attacks and proposes effective defenses like CAE and DCAE.

item.title: Label Inference Attacks Against Vertical Federated Learning
item.description: Evaluates privacy risks of vertical federated learning (VFL) and proposes label inference attacks with outstanding performance, highlighting vulnerabilities and defense limitations.
